reference: Poterba, James M., 1989, Tax reform and the market for tax-exempt debt, Renional Science and Urban Economics 19, 537-562.

Poterba, James M., 1986, Explaining the yield spread between taxable and tax exempt bonds, in H. Rosen, ea., Studies in State and Local Public Finance (Chicago: University of Chicago Press), 5-48.
